alert.note: Alert for Johnson County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 6:40PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Logan and southwestern Johnson Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 640 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Woodland, or near Clarksville, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarksville... Lamar... Hartman... Hoyt... Woodland... Hinkle... Spadra... Coal Hill... Morrison Bluff... New Spadra... Harmony... Union City... Hunt... Hillcrest in Johnson County... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Johnson County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County; Western and Northern Logan County
